results.releaseNotes: All updates are important, of course. This one contains security updates, and as we know, they’re the most important kind of all.
results.description:
Slack brings team communication and collaboration into one place so you can get more work done, whether you belong to a large enterprise or a small business. Check off your to-do list and move your projects forward by bringing the right people, conversations, tools, and information you need together. Slack is available on any device, so you can find and access your team and your work, whether you’re at your desk or on the go.

Use Slack to: 
• Communicate with your team and organize your conversations by topics, projects, or anything else that matters to your work
• Message or call any person or group within your team
• Share and edit documents and collaborate with the right people all in Slack 
• Integrate into your workflow, the tools and services you already use including Google Drive, Salesforce, Dropbox, Asana, Twitter, Zendesk, and more
• Easily search a central knowledge base that automatically indexes and archives your team’s past conversations and files
• Customize your notifications so you stay focused on what matters

Scientifically proven (or at least rumored) to make your working life simpler, more pleasant, and more productive. We hope you’ll give Slack a try.

Stop by and learn more at: https://slack.com/

results.trackCensoredName: QuickPlan Slack Bot - Project Management team Communication & Collaboration
results.description:
QuickPlan Slack BOT, a BOT app connecting to Slack messaging service, which represents a QuickPlan project, to talk with with other Slack users like a human, for team project communication and collaboration. A new way to get simple project management admin work done, spend less time than communicating with team members in meetings, and reduce email to delivery project schedule and collect progress status. That's QuickPlan Slack BOT.

* QuickPlan Slack BOT represents a project plan created by QuickPlan apps (http://quickplan.xyz) 
* QuickPlan Slack BOT is a app running on your Mac device, to communicate with other slack users via Slack BOT service (www.slack.com). 

The simple and cheapest solution for team collaboration for project schedule. 

PROJECT MEMBERs via Slack (web, iOS, Mac, Android, Windows apps) to
・Get help 
・Query in-processing tasks of the project member
・Query in-processing tasks of the whole project
・Query details of a specific task
・Download project file
・Ask the bot to create partial project to only include the tasks of the project member
・Update task % complete
・List task % complete updates 
・Cancel task update
・Suggest a new task
・Cancel task suggestions 
・List task suggestions

PROJECT MANAGER via QuickPlan Slack BOT to
・Import Project (this BOT represents the project) 
・Permission management - grant permission to slack users to access project information (by talking with this BOT) 
・Review (approve or reject) user updates includes % complete updates and task suggests 
・Version management - QuickPlan Slack BOT stores multiple versions of the project, for tracking the changes

The project file created by QuickPlan apps: 
QuickPlan for Mac - https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1071586133 
QuickPlan for iPad - https://itunes.apple.com/app/id621375878
QuickPlan for iPhone - https://itunes.apple.com/app/id699434089
results.trackName: QuickPlan Slack Bot - Project Management team Communication & Collaboration

results.description: Share awesome posts or send messages to your teams with this Safari Extension.

Activebot for Slack prevents Slack from going idle due to inactivity.

NOTES:
This application requires Slack authentication using one of the following methods:
1) "Activebot for Slack" app installed for your team
2) Legacy token

Please verify you have access to adding apps to your Slack team or generating legacy tokens before purchasing this application at:

https://api.slack.com/custom-integrations/legacy-tokens

results.trackCensoredName: ChannelScrobbler - Real-time scrobble bot for Last.fm/Slack
results.releaseNotes:
* Fixed bug where custom bot name was not saved between application launches.
* Fixed artist info lookup/sterilization so that if Last.fm lookup fails original scrobble info is displayed instead.
* Updated some metadata.
results.description:
ChannelScrobbler is a fun way to post your Last.fm scrobbles to a Slack channel in real-time.  Create a music channel and show your friends and co-workers what you're listening to and see their favorites as well.  

Other solutions like IFTTT poll the Last.fm feed and only update every 15 minutes or so, ChannelScrobbler allows you to choose your update period and see updates as frequently as every 30 seconds.  

ChannelScrobbler runs in your status bar and can launch on startup, so it's always there, listing every track you play.  Because ChannelScrobbler reads your Last.fm feed scrobbles from your account it will catch new songs from any device that supports scrobbling, not just your computer!

* Includes retina graphics and support for dark status bars!
* Scrobbles are posted by a bot with customizable name, avatar, and colors.

If you're having problems using ChannelScrobbler, please email edelabar@gmail.com for support.
results.trackName: ChannelScrobbler - Real-time scrobble bot for Last.fm/Slack

results.description:
Note: Please see Frequently Asked Questions below before installing.

Use Ratstash to:

- Import channels, direct messages and group conversations.
- Export your messages to CSV or text inside the App.
- Leave the App running to download new conversations.
- Find what you want instantly with the powerful grep-style search tool, no more scrolling through hundreds of pages of messages.

See more at https://ratstash.app.

Frequently Asked Questions
---------------------------
Question: Do I have to be the workspace administrator to use this this App?

Answer: No, you don't, however you do need to either:
- Be able to sign in to your Slack account and request/generate a token here (https://api.slack.com/custom-integrations/legacy-tokens). You will definitely be able to use Ratstash if you have a token (you paste this into the App). Or;
- Install as an App to your team (https://slack.com/apps/AATHN8U86-ratstashapp). All members except guests are allowed to this. Please check your privileges in your team to confirm.

Question: How far back in message history can I export?
Answer: It depends.
- If you're on a free Slack team: Ratstash has the same history limits as what you'd experience using the Slack UI (10k limit). However, once Ratstash retrieves the history, it will be kept forever.
- If you're on a paid Slack team, you can export all history with Ratstash.
